channel.title: ReaperXScape ~~~Screw The Rest, Play The Best~~~
channel.description:
[center] [size=18pt]ReaperXScape[/size] Hey Guys, Im ReaperX the owner of ReaperXScape! ReaperXScape (RXS) Is My Allstar Rsps, I am in competition with Arham 4 To see who gets the best Allstar! i have other competition, but it wont stop me! (futurescape, allstar-uria, miscellania, fizzerX-scape, hellfire-pk) yeah thats my competition, but i will make you not wanna play those servers! because after you see this thread, you wont want to ever play another Allstar!
First Off, You may be thinking : 1 : Why The hell are you on ReaperXScape2 for an acc? Answer : my other acc got hacked! 2 : Why Dont you just edit your old thread? Answer : My old acc is hacked, so i cant...
~Old Features~ -new funpk! when you kill somebody at funpk they lose no items, and they will drop a good random item, or bones (more then likely) -every 1 hour minutes ingame you automatically receive 1gp - 200mgp -jar client (easy to use) -random events (being worked on) every couple mins, a random event comes, to stop stupid auto clicks! -new home area -yell titles (::titles to see the list ingame) -made antiSYI to block nulls/crashes or whatever SYI is... -working clan chats -when you kill a boss and get an item (except coins or bones) it sends a message to all players online of the drop! -working bank pins (they just dont save, i messed up my saving methods (being worked on)) -made 4 quests [the noclip tragedy], [the blood diamond], [the ice diamond], [excalibur ownage]. -void minigame -90% creds to owner of futurescape! -working dices (50x2, 70x3, 85x5) -dicer npc, enter the amount of 1b tickets to bet! -rares area! (drops are shouted to all players) -skill exp lamps (gives lvl 125 in random skill) -working and accurate boss drops (works for all bosses) -whenever you achieve lvl 125 in a skill, you get a mystery box (mystery box gives a random custom) -when you kill the custom dropping boss, he drops a custom 1/15 chance, so its rare -added super boss (drops pumpkin and rogue armour) -pumpkin heals 125 hp, and you can use infinity times (rare drop and super hard!) -rogue armour = very strong and when you wear the whole set you get + 150 maxhit -spined armour gives +120 maxhit -bandos, skeletal and armadyl armour sets being worn give bonus maxhits also -no more shops for bandos or armadyl -bandos armadyl and all other strong items are obtained from bosses -no more rares shops, rares are collectibles and not sellable to shops! -click the skills box on skills tab for quick chat skill levels! -*added command ::copy for admins, copy the armour that other players wear! -*added working flower game (with flower picking up) -*added summoning -*all boss areas are now safe zones -*new skills area -*most of the messages arnt as colorful and not as much distracting -*fixed messages sent after you get a rare drop -*woodcutting for logs instead of cash -*mining gives random ores -*fixed funpk and dying methods -*added mithril seeds as boss drops -*Working Runecrafting (at the abyss) -*Better XP lamps, normal 1 gives 500k xp, antique lamp gives 500k X your level in the skill -*You Can Only Open The Shops In The Quest Tab When Not In Combat -*::Bank For Mods Only Now -*New Mining Area -*Removed all ways to get customs, now you must get archery tickets (not yet descided how to achieve them) and then buy the customs at the shops at home. -::alchprice (itemid) tells you the amount the item will alch for, get nats from rcing -removed unnecessary commands -added barrows - 60% complete (will be finished today) -reduced colors in the sendMessages, because to much color is annoying and ugly. - so much more that i cant think about rofl...
~~~Newest updates~~~ -Fully Working Barrows (almost identical to real rs barrows, just the doors aren't 100%) -Over 60 Yell Titles To Choose From! -Fully Working Slayer (Easy, Medium, Hard Tasks) -New Skill : Dungeoneering (get xp from completing floors, no use for dung points yet...) -New Skill : Minigaming (complete Minigames For XP, This Skill Gives Combat Levels) -New Skill : Knowledge (answer math questions (easy) to obtain xp, this boosts maxhit) -New Skill : Hunter (not trainable yet) -Raffle System (Picks A Winner Every 30 Mins, The Rewards Given to players aren't working 100%, idk why) -Added cheat client "detector" blocks some of the cheats -Almost all skills work -Working items on death interface (shows items in invent, and being worn) -And More...
~~~Pictures~~~ [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/x3URZyg.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/tR7MuoA.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/I5LLOuI.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/2BhWvnu.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/NpbhN2A.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ex0Kl30.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/fUSKoMN.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/u0vl80z.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/WrHTuMZ.png[/img]
[size=50pt]WILL BE UPDATING OFTEN![/size]
[/center]

item.title: ReaperXScape ~~~Screw The Rest, Play The Best~~~
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.source: ReaperXScape ~~~Screw The Rest, Play The Best~~~

item.title: ReaperXScape ~~~Screw The Rest, Play The Best~~~
item.dc:creator: @reaperxscape2 reaperxscape2
item.description:
@reaperxscape2 wrote:

[center]
[size=18pt]ReaperXScape[/size]
Hey Guys, Im ReaperX the owner of ReaperXScape!
ReaperXScape (RXS) Is My Allstar Rsps, I am in competition with Arham 4 To see who gets the best Allstar!
i have other competition, but it wont stop me! (futurescape, allstar-uria, miscellania, fizzerX-scape, hellfire-pk)
yeah thats my competition, but i will make you not wanna play those servers! because after you see this thread, you wont want to ever play another Allstar!

First Off, You may be thinking :
1 : Why The hell are you on ReaperXScape2 for an acc?
Answer : my other acc got hacked!
2 : Why Dont you just edit your old thread?
Answer : My old acc is hacked, so i cant…

~Old Features~
-new funpk! when you kill somebody at funpk they lose no items, and they will drop a good random item, or bones (more then likely)
-every 1 hour minutes ingame you automatically receive 1gp - 200mgp
-jar client (easy to use)
-random events (being worked on) every couple mins, a random event comes, to stop stupid auto clicks!
-new home area
-yell titles (::titles to see the list ingame)
-made antiSYI to block nulls/crashes or whatever SYI is…
-working clan chats
-when you kill a boss and get an item (except coins or bones) it sends a message to all players online of the drop!
-working bank pins (they just dont save, i messed up my saving methods (being worked on))
-made 4 quests [the noclip tragedy], [the blood diamond], [the ice diamond], [excalibur ownage].
-void minigame -90% creds to owner of futurescape!
-working dices (50x2, 70x3, 85x5)
-dicer npc, enter the amount of 1b tickets to bet!
-rares area! (drops are shouted to all players)
-skill exp lamps (gives lvl 125 in random skill)
-working and accurate boss drops (works for all bosses)
-whenever you achieve lvl 125 in a skill, you get a mystery box (mystery box gives a random custom)
-when you kill the custom dropping boss, he drops a custom 1/15 chance, so its rare
-added super boss (drops pumpkin and rogue armour)
-pumpkin heals 125 hp, and you can use infinity times (rare drop and super hard!)
-rogue armour = very strong and when you wear the whole set you get + 150 maxhit
-spined armour gives +120 maxhit
-bandos, skeletal and armadyl armour sets being worn give bonus maxhits also
-no more shops for bandos or armadyl
-bandos armadyl and all other strong items are obtained from bosses
-no more rares shops, rares are collectibles and not sellable to shops!
-click the skills box on skills tab for quick chat skill levels!
-*added command ::copy for admins, copy the armour that other players wear!
-*added working flower game (with flower picking up)
-*added summoning
-*all boss areas are now safe zones
-*new skills area
-*most of the messages arnt as colorful and not as much distracting
-*fixed messages sent after you get a rare drop
-*woodcutting for logs instead of cash
-*mining gives random ores
-*fixed funpk and dying methods
-*added mithril seeds as boss drops
-*Working Runecrafting (at the abyss)
-*Better XP lamps, normal 1 gives 500k xp, antique lamp gives 500k X your level in the skill
-You Can Only Open The Shops In The Quest Tab When Not In Combat
-::Bank For Mods Only Now
-*New Mining Area
-*Removed all ways to get customs, now you must get archery tickets (not yet descided how to achieve them) and then buy the customs at the shops at home.
-::alchprice (itemid) tells you the amount the item will alch for, get nats from rcing
-removed unnecessary commands
-added barrows - 60% complete (will be finished today)
-reduced colors in the sendMessages, because to much color is annoying and ugly.

  • so much more that i cant think about rofl…

~Newest updates~
-Fully Working Barrows (almost identical to real rs barrows, just the doors aren’t 100%)
-Over 60 Yell Titles To Choose From!
-Fully Working Slayer (Easy, Medium, Hard Tasks)
-New Skill : Dungeoneering (get xp from completing floors, no use for dung points yet…)
-New Skill : Minigaming (complete Minigames For XP, This Skill Gives Combat Levels)
-New Skill : Knowledge (answer math questions (easy) to obtain xp, this boosts maxhit)
-New Skill : Hunter (not trainable yet)
-Raffle System (Picks A Winner Every 30 Mins, The Rewards Given to players aren’t working 100%, idk why)
-Added cheat client “detector” blocks some of the cheats
-Almost all skills work
-Working items on death interface (shows items in invent, and being worn)
-And More…

~Pictures~

x3URZyg.png764×500




NpbhN2A.png762×402

ex0Kl30.png780×540

fUSKoMN.png781×537


WrHTuMZ.png779×537

[size=50pt]WILL BE UPDATING OFTEN![/size]

[/center]
